requestGoodAnswer.result: select distinct ?nameMovie ?nameActor where { ?movie rdf:type <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/Film>. ?movie <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/starring> <?randomActorApp>. ?movie rdfs:label ?nameMovie. <?randomActorApp> rdfs:label ?nameActor. FILTER(LANGMATCHES(LANG(?nameActor), 'en') && LANGMATCHES(LANG(?nameMovie), 'en')) }

requestBadAnswer.result: select distinct ?nameBadMovie where { <?randomMovie2App> rdf:type <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/Film>. <?randomMovie2App> rdfs:label ?nameBadMovie. FILTER(LANGMATCHES(LANG(?nameBadMovie), 'en')) }
